SMW Subobject for FinishNPC location: Werewolf Agility Course, near CanifisUses infobox: NPCNPC ID: 5927Examine: Have you brought him the stick yet?Release date: 31 January 2005Image: File:Agility Trainer.pngIs members only: trueIs variant of: Agility Trainer

Agility Trainers are werewolves found at the Werewolf Agility Course. After completion of the course, the stick must be given to one of them to receive extra Agility experience. Other wolves are scattered across the course.

  • 2 Changes
    • 2.1 Gallery (historical)

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Referencing Monty Python, one of the trainers sometimes exclaims, "I never really wanted to be an agility trainer..."
